mapper.select: select t.id, t.p_id,t.name as title, (case when (select count(1) from cms_column where p_id = t.id) > 0 then 'false' else 'true' end ) as isLeaf from cms_column t where t.p_id = #{pId} and t.site_id = #{siteId} order by t.order_no

select t.id, t.p_id, t.site_id, t.name, t.slug, t.type, t.is_release, t.cover_proportion_width, t.cover_proportion_height, t.description, t.remarks, t.status, cc.name as parentName from cms_column t left join cms_column cc on cc.id = t.p_id where t.id= #{id}

select t.id,t.name,t.order_no from cms_column t where t.p_id = #{pId} and t.site_id = #{siteId} order by t.order_no
limit #{str},#{length}
select t.id, t.p_id,t.name as title from cms_column t where (t.name like #{title} or t.slug like #{title}) and t.site_id = #{siteId} order by t.p_id,t.order_no
select t.id, t.p_id,t.name as title from cms_column t where t.status = #{status} and t.site_id = #{siteId} order by t.order_no

select t.id, t.p_id, t.site_id, t.name, t.slug, t.type, t.is_release, t.cover_proportion_width, t.cover_proportion_height, t.description, t.remarks, t.status, cc.name as parentName from cms_column t left join cms_column cc on cc.id = t.p_id where t.slug= #{slug} and t.site_id = #{siteId}

select t.id, t.site_id, t.name from cms_column t
